channel.title: How to make a Server intertent compatable?
channel.description:
Hey, i'm moderately new to the Moparscape thing, i was wondering if anyone knew how to make a game internet copatable and by this i mean i can run my own server, if you could please post a link to a similar question that has been asked and has an answer
Thanks a bunch,
CColeman
